Package org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLNativeKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Callback
      • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLNativeKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, CLNativeKernelI, org.lwjgl.system.CallbackI, org.lwjgl.system.CallbackI.V, org.lwjgl.system.NativeResource, org.lwjgl.system.Pointer

    public abstract class CLNativeKernel
extends org.lwjgl.system.Callback
implements CLNativeKernelI
    Instances of this class may be passed to the EnqueueNativeKernel method.
